page.title: 20Games We Play In School
page.content:
At school we have two playtimes.When we come to school we have lessons until 10.30.At 10.30 we have a play for 20 minutes.During this playtime we play chase, cricket or breakdancing.Chase is a game were somebody is "IT" and they chase after somebody and tig them or catch them.Cricket is a game using a bat and ball.To win you have to score the most runs.Breakdancing is where you jump onto the floor and make funny shapes.After play we go into school for a lesson.At 12.10 we have lunch we go out at 12.30 and we might play what we played at little play.After this play we come back into class and work until 3.15, then it's time to go home.
By Tracey Surman.
